QuestData.Title: Sholazar Basin
QuestData.Description: Hemet Nesingwary was last heard from leading an expedition into the jungle depths of Sholazar Basin. His expedition has not been heard from since.$b$bMonte Muzzleshot is a pilot who was dispatched to provide them supplies, but he hasn't returned, either.$b$bVolunteers are needed to mount an expedition to find the missing expedition. Monte's flying machine was last seen in the Wildgrowth Mangal south of the Suntouched Pillar in Sholazar Basin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Monte Muzzleshot in the Wildgrowth Mangal of Sholazar Basin.
